programme.desc: Teddy Bear - Po finds a teddy bear in Teletubbyland. Tinky Winky, Dipsy, LaaLaa and Po excitedly show the teddy to the Tiddlytubbies and they all love it very much.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S4 Ep12
programme.desc: Tractor - Dee encourages a friend to say 'tractor' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see all sorts of tractors - a blue tractor, a pulling tractor, a stuck in the mud tractor and an on a farm tractor.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep39
programme.desc: Queen Mae-Mae - Mae-Mae is queen for the day, the rest of the friends can't wait to play in Mae-Mae's new kingdom. When she takes the game a little too far, Queen Mae-Mae tries to put things right and restore harmony in the Pop Paper City Kingdom.

programme.desc: Wild Girls - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep43
programme.desc: Dragon - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep2
programme.desc: The Face Painting Badge - The Squirrels are looking for Duggee but can't find him. Instead, they find someone who looks like Enid, only much too big. Duggee has painted his face to look like Enid!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep1
programme.desc: The Carrot Badge - The Squirrels are admiring Duggee's crop of giant carrots when they hear a noise. They find the Rabbits busy preparing for the Carrot Solstice.

programme.desc: Calm Down - Water, water, everywhere - there's a flood in our hospital soap opera! Grown-up Tag the firefighter splashes around. It's a good job grown-up Happy the lifeguard is on hand

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Master of Puppets - At Squirrel Club, there's a story told in blocks, the tale of a first tooth, a fable about changing emotions, and a yarn involving the Squirrels as puppets.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep23
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Whale Rescue - After a pod of pilot whales becomes stranded at the Academy beach, the Go Jetters, with help from new teacher Professor Wave, must work fast to return them to the ocean deeps.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Hotel - Bluey and Bingo run a crazy "Hotel" with Dad as their put upon guest. But when Bingo quits over Bluey being too controlling, Dad needs to teach them how to compromise.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep12
programme.desc: Sticky Gecko - Mum must get Bluey and Bingo out the door in time for a playdate, but they can't leave before they finish their game - waiting for a sticky rubber gecko to drop from the ceiling.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Andy and the Meerkat Pups - Andy, Jen and Scout head off on a global adventure to Botswana, Africa and embark on a baby animal mission to help a meerkat family move home. Along the way, Andy meets some zebra and must race across an enormous salt pan to escape a hungry jackal.

programme.title: Dog Squad S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Mission: Sleepover - Rayane, Karim and Luca are having a sleepover when hearing dog Diesel is woken in the middle of the night by a strange hissing noise. Is there a slithery snake in the kitchen?

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild S2 Ep12
programme.desc: Zebra and Red-Bellied Piranha - This episode features the zebra and the red-bellied piranha. Their wild connection is they live in large groups, increasing their chance of survival.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep10
programme.desc: Remote Control - The pirates find an old remote control, Captain Captain realises she can use it to control her crew!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep26
programme.desc: The Obstacle Course Badge - It's time for the annual Animal Obstacle Course Race. The animals need to work together in teams to complete the course.

programme.desc: The Going Slow Badge - The Squirrels are rushing around, so Duggee shows them how to take a slower pace.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep24
programme.desc: The Memory Badge - Happy discovers his wobbly tooth has come out, but he's lost it! He's having a problem remembering where he was when it fell out.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep44
programme.desc: Whistler Mountain, Canada - The Go Jetters are on Whistler Mountain in Canada doing some skiing and checking out the amazing cable car which runs high up between the mountains.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep43
programme.desc: Bird Migration: Spain & Africa - In this aerial adventure the Go Jetters are on the Strait of Gibraltar, Southern Spain to follow a group of migrating baby stalks as they make their journey from Spain to Africa.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep18
programme.desc: Deep Trouble - Max and Monty's antics on a construction site get them into trouble.

It also makes use of trending topics online, while focusing on what's relevant in China and the world.

programme.desc: Not One Less - Women in Mexico Fight Femicide - Every year in Mexico, thousands of women are killed simply because they are women. Femicide rates in the country are among the highest in the world. Authorities often turn a blind eye, allowing perpetrators to go unpunished. But resistance is growing.

programme.title: Planet A
programme.desc: Why a city in Sweden filled these caves with almost boiling water - Somewhere below the Swedish city of Vsters, there's a big cave. During the Cold War, it was used to store oil. But the local energy company decided to clean it, pump it full of water and heat it up. Here's why they did that.

programme.title: DocFilm
programme.desc: Saving the Moors in Poland - The Polish village of Rozwarowo in northern Poland is saving the moors. Local thatcher Alfred Smolczynski initiated the process: Hes been renaturalizing the moor since the 1980s, in the face of much resistance. Now, bird conservationists are reintroducing the sedge warbler there.
